message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100?
I understand that $150 is a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $135.
I appreciate the willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
I can see that you're really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $130.
I really appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $125?
